examples: Weigela florida var. praecox (Lemoine) Y.C. Chu in Nat. Resources Res., 1979(2):  2 (1979). Bupleurum bicaule var. latifolium Y.C. Chu in Fl. Pl. Herb. Chin. Bor.  Or., 6: 293, 195 (1977).
source: IK db. Date from Index Herb. Sin.: 233 (1993). Bibliography of Chinese Tax. Bot.  uses the transliteration 'Chu, You Chang' and Index Herb. Sin. uses the  transliteration 'Zhu, You Chang' on p. 424.
